welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aubervilliers, a charming city known for its rich cultural heritage and vibrant street markets. We hope you enjoy exploring all that Aubervilliers has to offer and have a wonderful time during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, used for low-cost airlines and some charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection after a certain period of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
